Package org.wildfly.security.util

Package to hold utility classes of the Elytron project.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    EnumerationIterator<E>
    An enumeration which is also an iterator.
    TransformationMapper
    TransformationMapper interface is used to map cipher tokens specified in various SASL mechanisms to transformation string used by JCE to construct new cipher algorithm.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractAlgorithmParametersSpiImpl<P extends AlgorithmParameterSpec>
    A base class for classes which implement AlgorithmParametersSpi that encode parameters using ASN.1.
    Alphabet Deprecated 
    Alphabet.Base32Alphabet
    A base-32 alphabet.
    Alphabet.Base64Alphabet
    A base-64 alphabet.
    ArrayIterator<E>
    A read-only iterator over an array.
    AtomicFileOutputStream  
    AtomicFileOutputStream.State  
    ByteIterator Deprecated
    Use ByteIterator instead.
    ByteStringBuilder Deprecated
    Use ByteStringBuilder instead.
    CodePointIterator Deprecated
    Use CodePointIterator instead.
    DefaultTransformationMapper
    Default implementation of TransformationMapper interface.
    JsonUtil
    Utilities for JSON manipulation.
    LdapUtil
    Utilities for LDAP attributes manipulation.
    NumericIterator Deprecated 
    PasswordBasedEncryptionUtil
    Password Based Encryption utility class for tooling.
    PasswordBasedEncryptionUtil.Builder
    Builder class to build PasswordBasedEncryptionUtil class with all necessary parameters to support password based encryption algorithms.
    ProviderServiceLoaderSupplier
    A supplier which uses a service loader to find all Provider instances that aren't in the list of installed security providers and returns them as an array.
    ProviderUtil
    Utilities for dealing with security providers.
    ServiceLoaderSupplier<E>
    A supplier which uses a service loader to find all instances of the given service, and return them as an array.
    StringEnumeration
    An indexed enumeration of strings.
    StringEnumeration.Data  
    StringMapping<T>
    An efficient mapping of enumerated strings to some other object.
    TransformationSpec
    Data class used by TransformationMapper instances to return desired mapping data.
    URIUtil
    Utilities for URI manipulation and canonicalization.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    DecodeException
    An exception which indicates that Base64/hex decoding has failed due to invalid or truncated input.

Package org.wildfly.security.util Description

Package to hold utility classes of the Elytron project.
Author:
Darran Lofthouse
